name: Super Green Crack
description: Super Green Crack is a true sativa. Like a cup of strong coffee, this strain will give you a hefty boost of energy to start your day. The daughter of Super Silver Haze and Green Crack, Super Green Crack is vivacious, thoughtful, and creative. This strain is perfect for those looking to combat fatigue or depression. Super Green Crack features an extremely pungent aroma,  producing a strong skunk-like scent. The effects of this strain are moderate to long-lasting, and a little goes a long way.
descriptionPlain: Super Green Crack is a true sativa. Like a cup of strong coffee, this strain will give you a hefty boost of energy to start your day. The daughter of Super Silver Haze and Green Crack, Super Green Crack is vivacious, thoughtful, and creative. This strain is perfect for those looking to combat fatigue or depression. Super Green Crack features an extremely pungent aroma,  producing a strong skunk-like scent. The effects of this strain are moderate to long-lasting, and a little goes a long way.

highlightedReviews.text: This is strong enough it should come with a warning. Whatever you do, don't mix it with hash or concentrate. You will end up wrestling with bisexual-gorilla-dragons that don't exist in this dimension.
Top of the line sativa. Great if you need to get sh** done

articles.title: 8 Cannabis Strains That Will Make You Exclaim "Holy Cow!"
articles.author: Rebecca Kelley
articles.text:
Because every day must be deemed a holiday (however pithy) in this digital world, July 12th was “Cow Appreciation Day,” which sounds udderly ridiculous until you realize what our bovine buddies have contributed to the cannabis moo-vement. In addition to a number of cow-themed strains such as Alpha Cow, Madcow, Purple Cow, and Afghan Cow, our comely cattle companions have also inspired an oft-used phrase used in many a Leafly review: “Holy cow!”
In honor of these dearly beloved domesticated ungulates, here are eight cannabis strains that inspired Leafly reviewers to exclaim “Holy cow” that I’ve helpfully paired with a corresponding gif.
  Durban Poison
“holy cow I’m flying. no such thing as stress or anxiety with this strain.” – chaosanon

 
  Blockhead
“I hit some of this from a bong along with some crazy dank lemon skunk and then vaped some of this blockhead (all with a friend) and holy cow i was flying high as a kite.” – chroniccannabisconsumsr

 
  Kandy Kush
“Holy cow was a privilege to try out this strain. […] Probably the smoothest that I have ever smoked. Was like a dream and to boot the exquisite candy floss flavour it brings is unbelievable!” – TheBigGreenGiant

 
  Super Green Crack
“Holy cow. […] Never felt more energetic in my life. Just felt like an energy to just get up and start doing shit. – hkim823

 
  Sage N Sour
“first commercially grow strain I’ve ever had, that being said HOLY COW! I ripped three huge hits from a bong and didn’t feel much yet so I killed the bowl, then it hit me …. I had to sit down for a sec and as the high progressed I got more and more energetic and super trippy I dont know how else to describe it but like being in. a 3D movie it was weird and then the world got flat and 2D like it was amazing then as I was coming down I felt like a super hero being ably to switch between reality,2D ,And more real than real 3D movie feeling” – COMetalHead

 
  Lemon Haze
“Holy COW. […] I got it last night, after I had already been smoking so I didn’t truly know its potential. I woke up this morning and loaded it up, about 2 hours before I had to go to work, with my last hit about 30 minutes before work. It is a GREAT get up and go, but be warned, you might [not] comprehend what you [are] getting up and going to. […] It was a fun experience though. :3” – thewhitewidow


  God Bud
“…I tried this concentrate and HOLY FREAKNG COW! This is the best indica. I was immediately at ease and calm. Great for relaxing at home.” – ariellm91

 
  Pandora’s Box
“…My new favorite strain. Holy cow man. […] After decades doing this, I’m higher than I have been in recent memory. Crazy good stuff…” – MrFadedGlory

articles.title: Luck o' the Irish: 15 'Green' Strains to Help You Celebrate St. Patrick's Day
articles.author: Rebecca Kelley
articles.text:
Even if you haven’t got a little Irish in ya, most everyone enjoys celebrating St. Patrick’s Day. After all, it’s an excuse to drink some Guinness, eat some soda bread and corned beef with hash, and pinch forgetful friends who aren’t wearing some hue of green today. This being Leafly, of course, we have a list of strains with a little “green” in them to help you further celebrate a fun little holiday.
Without further ado, here are 15 green-themed cannabis strains:
  1. Green Candy
Type: sativa
Top flavors: sweet, citrus, minty
Top effects: happy, euphoric, energetic
Top medical uses: pain, stress, depression
Sample review:
“One of the top 5 sativas. I always want this as part of my available medications.” – Crucian1
  2. Green Crack
Type: sativa
Top flavors: sweet
Top effects: euphoric, uplifted, energetic
Top medical uses: stress, depression, pain
Sample review:
“I love this strain. Gives me a light, pleasant high that’s perfect to unwind and listen to music to. Especially with friends! Definitely try this, people!” – EmAy55
  3. Green Crack Extreme
Type: sativa
Top flavors: sweet, citrus, minty
Top effects: euphoric, happy, uplifted
Top medical uses: stress, fatigue, depression
Sample review:
“Its [sic] a step above most sativa strains and probably some of the best Sativas available.” – Crucian1
  4. Green Door Kush
Type: hybrid
Top flavors: lemon, sweet
Top effects: creative, euphoric, happy
Top medical uses: nausea, insomnia, muscle spasms
Sample review:
“Love the taste and smell. Some great stuff even for a long time smoker, but if you a new be, be careful” – KevinlovesBud
  5. Green Dream
Type: hybrid
Top flavors: minty, pine, spicy/herbal
Top effects: euphoric, happy, uplifted
Top medical uses: stress, depression, pain
Sample review:
“I love this strain. I was cleaning and organizing my house like crazy. Very talkative and energetic. Amazing day high.” – KSlizzle
  6. Green Goblin
Type: sativa
Top flavors: diesel, grapefruit, pine
Top effects: euphoric, uplifted, happy
Top medical uses: stress, pain, depression
Sample review:
“Very good strain. No heavy eyes. No laziness. Very uplifting feeling and sense if [sic] euphoria.” – Anonymous
  7. Green Haze
Type: sativa
Top flavors: pine, tea, woody
Top effects: focused, uplifted, euphoric
Top medical uses: pain, nausea, stress
Sample review:
“Great Strain for anxiety, make u feel really up and euphoric great for focusing and just taking on the day” – Eric420
  8. Green Hornet
Type: hybrid
Top flavors: none tagged — leave a review!
Top effects: euphoric, focused, happy
Top medical uses: depression, pain, stress
Sample review:
“DELICIOUS!!! My tummy was hurting this morning but after a little green hornet in my bowl I’m feeling ready to take on the day!” – AZCSWestPhx
  9. Green Kush
Type: indica
Top flavors: sweet, apricot, honey
Top effects: euphoric, relaxed, focused
Top medical uses: pain, depression, stress
Sample review:
“Very very potent strain, gets you a very heavy body high along with a bit of a head high. Prepare to turn into potato, but great for parties/groups. Very stoned.” – Anonymous
  10. Green Monster
Type: hybrid
Top flavors: earthy, pine, pungent
Top effects: sleepy, relaxed, happy
Top medical uses: insomnia, stress, depression
Sample review:
“i either have some strong shit or its [sic] all this good haha at least as good as green crack, mabie [sic] better” – Anonymous
  11. Green Queen
Type: hybrid
Top flavors: spicy/herbal, earthy, nutty
Top effects: happy, uplifted, euphoric
Top medical uses: stress, nausea, depression
Sample review:
“Green queen is my go to when I need to be productive. This is the most productive strain I’ve used with the least amount of anxiety. Can also be very giggly.” – ChristWithAY
  12. Green Ribbon
Type: hybrid
Top flavors: citrus, pungent, skunk
Top effects: energetic, happy, uplifted
Top medical uses: stress, nausea, pain
Sample review:
“One of only two strains I’ve ever smoked that’s given me energy. I find that my thoughts are very focused, and I can carry on conversations exceptionally well. Great strain for sitting around and talking. Very social strain. It actually made me want to dance!” – Anonymous
  13. Lime Green Skunk
Type: hybrid
Top flavors: none tagged — leave a review!
Top effects: uplifted, happy, euphoric
Top medical uses: stress, pain, insomnia
Sample review:
“Have enjoyed this strian very much. A very great energetic high, that really seems to mute grey down feelings both mentally and physically, and bring out higher, more talkitive [sic] sides. Very great for every aspect of enjoyment.” – Anonymous
  14. Martian Mean Green
Type: hybrid
Top flavors: sweet, blue cheese, grapefruit
Top effects: relaxed, euphoric, uplifted
Top medical uses: inflammation, nausea, stress
Sample review:
“It creeps up on you, makes you laugh and relieves pain. All around good time for a few hours.” – gurren_lynx
  15. Super Green Crack
Type: sativa
Top flavors: spicy/herbal, woody, diesel
Top effects: energetic, creative, happy
Top medical uses: stress, pain, fatigue
Sample review:
“BOMB Very mental.” – PuffPuffington911
